Name: AutoUserSpecification
Comment: Specifies the parameters for the auto user that runs a task on the Batch service

Key.Name: Scope
Key.SummaryComment: The scope for the auto user. If omitted, the default is <see cref="Common.AutoUserScope.Task"/>.

Key.Name: ElevationLevel
Key.SummaryComment: The elevation level of the auto user. If omitted, the default is <see cref="Common.ElevationLevel.NonAdmin"/>.
